name: Rewind Runner
description:
This game was made for Brackey's Game Jam 2020.2 (#4). 

Controls:                                         Features:

Move: A DJump: SpaceOnline ScoreboardRewind: FDash: ShiftPush sensitive jumpMenu: EscWall jumping/slidingRewind time

This game was made for Brackey's Game Jam 2020.2 (#4). 
A speedrunner platformer type of game with an ability to rewind time! Fear no more of dying or messing up your run times!
Leaderboards let you compete with other players and motivate to achieve even greater results!

Credits:
Art, programming and assets by M.A.D. (our 3 player team)
Music by  Chasing the Rise
https://www.youtube.com/user/ChasingTheRiseBand
